Service Details: - Provides convenient and affordable organic foods to the Central Okanagan area- Contributes to a local food culture that celebrates healthy, joyful eating- Committed to being part of a sustainable food system- Reduces distance from field to table by working closely with Okanagan farmers and offering as much locally grown produce as possible (annual average approximately 50%)- Donates leftover produce to the Kelowna Community Food Bank each week - Culled or spoiled produce is used by a local farm for animal feed and compost- Offers reduced prices on organic produce at Warehouse Sales each Saturday
Address & Map: 806A Crowley AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 7G7View MapQuest Map
